alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Holmes; Jackson; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Madison; Wakulla; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued June 15 at 3:18PM EDT until June 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 303 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 PM EDT /3 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA COFFEE DALE GENEVA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY MADISON WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ABE SPRINGS, ALMA, ALPINE HEIGHTS, APALACHICOLA, ARGYLE, ASBURY, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BARKER STORE, BATTENS CROSSROADS, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BEAMON, BELLVIEW, BENNETT, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNS CROSSROADS, BROWNTOWN, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CENTER RIDGE, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, COURTHOUSE, CRYSTAL LAKE, CUBA, DALEVILLE, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DECATUR CO A/P, DILL, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DRIFTON, DURHAM, EARLY CO A/P, ECONFINA, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE MUNICIPAL A/P, EUCHEEANNA, EWELL, FADETTE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FIVE POINTS, FORT GADSDEN, FORT RUCKER, FRINK, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HACODA, HANOVER, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARTFORD, HAWKINSTOWN, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, HONEYVILLE, HOPEWELL, HOWARD CREEK, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KEYTON, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LAKELAND, LAWRENCEVILLE, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LOVETT, LYNN, LYNN HAVEN, MABSON, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, NEW HOPE, NEWTON, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, ORANGE HILL, OZARK, PANAMA CITY, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PINETTA, POPLAR HEAD, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SCREAMER, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TILTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, AND WHITE CITY.
